column5: Hello   Happy New Year to all  I am also looking for a fish finder that i can use for ice fishing, i saw the post from the other lad. Was looking at the Lowrance x 67 c ice machine. but there are none to be found in the country, BP says they don t carry them anymore and Lebarons don t have any, so i am wondering if any one has any good ideas on something that works relatively well in the winter, I have a Lowrance i use on the boat but i think it might not work too good on the ice , besides it would take me a day to get it off the boat . any help would be appreciated, and i think i am not into flashers,     the fishing kind anyway!
Give Trembley's a call. I have had the x67 for about 3 years now and have zero to complain about.  Use it both on the boat and the ice.
i have been useing my hummingbird paranah max15 but im not to happy with it what adjustments should i from changeing it from softwater to hard water thanks in advance
Buy a Vexilar, Humminbird ICE, Marcum, or Showdown.
